'''Crows''' can be found along the path leading up to the [[Grand Narukami Shrine]] and on [[Tsurumi Island]]. Upon killing a crow, it will be added to the [[Archive]].

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|1}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].
